results.title: Anorectic effect of metformin in lean and genetically obese hyperglycaemic (ob/ob) mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Rectal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012002 @@@Anorectic@@@ effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in lean and genetically @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese hyperglycaemic@@@ (@GENE_LEP @GENE_16846 @@@ob@@@/@GENE_LEP @GENE_16846 @@@ob@@@) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Bailey CJ, Flatt PR, Ewan C. Anorectic effect of metformin in lean and genetically obese hyperglycaemic (ob/ob) mice. Arch Int Pharmacodyn Ther. 1986 Aug;282(2):233-9. PMID: 3767527
citations.BibTeX: @article{3767527, title={Anorectic effect of metformin in lean and genetically obese hyperglycaemic (ob/ob) mice.}, author={Bailey CJ and Flatt PR and Ewan C}, journal={Arch Int Pharmacodyn Ther}, volume={282}, number={2}, pages={233-9}}

results.title: Metformin in the first trimester and risks for specific birth defects in the National Birth Defects Prevention Study.
results.text_hl: For @DISEASE_Atrial_Septal_Defect_Secundum_Type @DISEASE_MESH:C566241 @@@atrial septal defect secundum@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Rectal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012002 @@@anorectal defects@@@, and @DISEASE_Ectromelia @DISEASE_MESH:D004480 @@@limb reduction defects@@@, the estimates for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ when used for @DISEASE_Infertility @DISEASE_MESH:D007246 @@@subfertility@@@ were 2-3-fold.

citations.NLM: Dukhovny S, Van Bennekom CM, Gagnon DR, Hernandez Diaz S, Parker SE, Anderka M, Werler MM, Mitchell AA. Metformin in the first trimester and risks for specific birth defects in the National Birth Defects Prevention Study. Birth Defects Res. 2018 Apr 17;110(7):579-586. PMID: 29388358
citations.BibTeX: @article{29388358, title={Metformin in the first trimester and risks for specific birth defects in the National Birth Defects Prevention Study.}, author={Dukhovny S and Van Bennekom CM and Gagnon DR and Hernandez Diaz S and Parker SE and Anderka M and Werler MM and Mitchell AA}, journal={Birth Defects Res}, volume={110}, number={7}, pages={579-586}}

results.title: Metformin suppresses colorectal aberrant crypt foci in a short-term clinical trial.
results.text_hl: The objective of this pilot study was to evaluate the chemopreventive effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Rectal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012002 @@@rectal aberrant@@@ crypt @DISEASE_Epilepsy_Partial_with_Variable_Foci @DISEASE_MESH:C565785 @@@foci@@@ (@DISEASE_Aberrant_Crypt_Foci @DISEASE_MESH:D058739 @@@ACF@@@), which are an endoscopic surrogate marker of @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colorectal cancer@@@.

citations.NLM: Hosono K, Endo H, Takahashi H, Sugiyama M, Sakai E, Uchiyama T, Suzuki K, Iida H, Sakamoto Y, Yoneda K, Koide T, Tokoro C, Abe Y, Inamori M, Nakagama H, Nakajima A. Metformin suppresses colorectal aberrant crypt foci in a short-term clinical trial. Cancer Prev Res (Phila). 2010 Sep;3(9):1077-83. PMID: 20810669
